Action.author: murrekatt
Action.body: Ran into the same after setup of dev env (http://hyperledger-fabric.readthedocs.io/en/latest/dev-setup/devenv/) and then building (http://hyperledger-fabric.readthedocs.io/en/latest/dev-setup/build/)

Action.author: jeffgarratt
Action.body: This is resolved with most recent updates and the new README.md which explains procedure for proper setup of python using virtual environments.
